data.name: 我！刘备！卖鞋救汉！
data.detailed_description:
The story
The story of Liu Bei who sold straw sandals to recruit soldiers and obtain special military generals and eventually unified The Three Kingdoms.

The characteristics of
* Hundreds of generals, hundreds of famous skills
* Perfect integration of simulated operation and tower defense strategy
* Retrace The Three Kingdoms Road and explore different histories

play
* Simulation business recruitment, unlock different military generals
* Explore history step by step through tower defense battles to unify the three continents

data.short_description: I! Liu Bei! Sell shoes to save han! Is a stand-alone role-playing/simulation management/tower defense strategy game. The story of Liu Bei who sold straw sandals to recruit soldiers and obtain special military generals and eventually unified The Three Kingdoms.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Pentium E2180 (2 * 2000) or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GT (256 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3240 (2 * 3400) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8800 GTS (512 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
